name: EasyRider
description:
EasyRider is a cozy 2D infinite runner (or I guess you could say infinite skier?) I made using Unity. 

Controls are simple: use your keyboard arrows to change the direction of the character and try to get as far as you can! You can also pick up coins to unlock new background music.

The game is available in browser, as a Windows executable, and on android.

You can see more of my completed projects here: https://www.noveltech.dev/work
